author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest 'A Colossal Discussion' Featurette for Jurassic World Rebirth, the latest installment in the Jurassic franchise distributed by Universal Pictures. Join director Gareth Edwards and Ben Lamm, co-founder and CEO of Colossal Biosciences Lab, on the real science behind Jurassic World and de-extinction. Jurassic World Rebirth is in theaters on July 2.

Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion, the planet’s ecology has proven largely inhospitable to dinosaurs. Those remaining exist in isolated equatorial environments with climates resembling the one in which they once thrived. The three most colossal creatures across land, sea and air within that tropical biosphere hold, in their DNA, the key to a drug that will bring miraculous life-saving benefits to humankind.

Scarlett Johansson plays skilled covert operations expert Zora Bennett, contracted to lead a skilled team on a top-secret mission to secure the genetic material. When Zora’s operation intersects with
title: Jurassic World Rebirth - Official Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Bailey

author: IGN
title: Glen Powell, Michael Cera, Josh Brolin, and Colman Domingo star in Edgar Wright's The Running Man

author: IGN
description:
Go back in time and see the prehistoric creatures of yesterday, but you might be doing more than seeing. These creatures come to life at night, and it's your job to make it out alive. Check out the Night of the Extinct teaser trailer for this upcoming horror game. Night of the Extinct will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Night of the Extinct - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Unleash Your Inner Kong' Trailer for Donkey Kong Bananza, the upcoming 3D action-adventure platformer developed by Nintendo. Players can bash, throw, and climb anything in Donkey Kong's way on a grand adventure with Pauline. Unleash your Inner Kong with Donkey Kong Bananza, launching on July 17 for Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Donkey Kong Bananza - Official 'Unleash Your Inner Kong' Trailer

author: IGN
title: Tune in to IGN tomorrow for a Let's Play of Mecha BREAK! Presented by @MechaBREAK

author: IGN
description:
Grab the squad, score the kills, and uh … FIRE. Check out the Call of Duty: Warzone & Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 x Beavis & Butt-Head collaboration trailer as Mike Judge’s iconic characters, Beavis & Butt-Head, are playable in Call of Duty Season 4 Reloaded. The trailer shows what you can expect with the Premium Event Pass, available on July 2. The Free Track highlights include “Todd” and “Coach Buzzcut” Operators, and more. The Call of Duty x Beavis and Butt-Head Tracer Pack bundle will be available on July 5, 2025.

Call of Duty: Warzone & Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Season 4 Reloaded will be available on July 2, 2025.
title: Call of Duty: Warzone & Black Ops 6 x Beavis & Butt-Head - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Season 3 Update | Dev Vision Vol. 07 for Marvel Rivals, a free-to-play team-based action multiplayer game developed by NetEase Games. Players can get the rundown on the new map, heroes, game-changing Team-Up abilities, and more from Creative Director Guangguang and Lead Combat Designer Zhiyong. Access the Klyntar: Celestial Husk map alongside new heroes with Blade and Jean Gray 'The Phoenix" make their way to Season 3 of Marvel Rivals, launching on July 11 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Marvel Rivals: Official Season 3 Update Overview

author: IGN
description:
The solo-developed pixel-art metroivania/survival game Primal Planet tasks you with protecting your family from dinosaurs...and also aliens. It's now got a release date for PC: July 28. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2350270/Primal_Planet/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Primal Planet - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
title: This Tokyo Ghoul Ken Kaneki figure has cool attachments and swappable pieces. Presented by @jazwares

author: IGN
description:
'Today is going to be THE. BEST. DAY. EVER!' Check out the trailer for The Cat in the Hat, an upcoming animated film starring Bill Hader (who voices the Cat), Xochitl Gomez, Matt Berry, Quinta Brunson, and Paula Pell, and featuring Tiago Martinez, Giancarlo Esposito, America Ferrera, Bowen Yang, and Tituss Burgess.

Meet the Cat in the Hat you don’t know! In the wonderfully whimsical tradition of Dr. Seuss, The Cat in the Hat comes to the big screen in his animated theatrical feature film debut, an all-new, epic adventure with an edge, where mischief, magic and mayhem reign supreme.
In The Cat in the Hat, the hero takes on his toughest assignment yet for the I.I.I.I. (Institute for the Institution of Imagination and Inspiration, LLC): to cheer Gabby and Sebastian, a pair of siblings struggling with their move to a new town. Known for taking things too far, this could be this agent of chaos’s last chance to prove himself...or lose his magical hat!

Directed by Alessandro Carloni and Er
title: The Cat in the Hat - Official Trailer (2025) Bill Hader, Xochitl Gomez, Matt Berry

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Sneak Peek Teaser Trailer for Marvel Animation's Eyes of Wakanda, an animated action series distributed by Marvel Studios. Fans will get the opportunity to explore the secrets and ongoings of Wakanda over the centuries it's existed within the context of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Marvel Animation's Eyes of Wakanda will stream the 4-episode series on August 27 exclusively on Disney+.

Wakandan warriors who, throughout history, have traveled the world to retrieve dangerous vibranium artifacts.

Marvel Animation's Eyes of Wakanda stars Gary Anthony Williams, Danai Gurira, Anika Noni Rose, Cress Williams, Lynn Whitfield, Steve Toussaint, Zeke Alton, Jona Xiao, Winnie Harlow, and more. 

Marvel Animation's Eyes of Wakanda will stream the 4-episode series on August 27 exclusively on Disney+.

#EyesOfWakanda #Marvel #IGN
title: Marvel Animation's Eyes of Wakanda - Official Sneak Peek Teaser Trailer (2025) Danai Gurira

author: IGN
description:
Meet the Machine Girls, characters, and see them in action in this Full Metal Schoolgirl announcement trailer for the upcoming action shooter from the developers behind Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2. Full Metal Schoolgirl will be available on PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store) on October 23, 2025.

Set in the year 2089, Full Metal Schoolgirl throws players into a dystopian Japan where the nation’s economy is dominated by Meternal Jobz, a corrupt corporate superpower whose zombified cyborg labor force, the “Working Dead,” are capable of working nonstop. As a fully armed cyborg schoolgirl heroine, players must ascend Meternal Jobz’s ever-shifting 100-story skyscraper, dismantling waves of undead salarymen, the dastardly CEO, and twisted security systems on a mission of personal revenge before their evil plans come to fruition.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Full Metal Schoolgirl - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We went hands on with about two hours worth of Donkey Kong Bananza and walked away positively buzzing about the latest from the Mario Odyssey team. Find out our full final preview impressions before the game releases on July 17.

#DonkeyKongBananza #Gaming #IGN
title: Donkey Kong Bananza - The Final Video Preview

author: IGN
description:
Check out 'The Abyss Awakens' Season 3 Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the free-to-play action team-hero shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players can experience an unmatched battle in the wake of the Timestream Entanglement as Knull stirs deep within Klyntar’s core, stretching his shadowed hands across the cosmos. The Phoenix arrives from across the stars to erase Klyntar and the darkness that is on the rise, but will need help from a warrior of two worlds who lives to fight against the tide of night. Blade and Phoenix arrive for Season 3 of Marvel Rivals on July 11 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#Blade #ThePhoenix #Gaming
title: Marvel Rivals - Official 'The Abyss Awakens' Season 3 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Strange Tales of the West' Trailer for Red Dead Online, the online component to the hit Red Dead Redemption 2 developed by Rockstar Games. Players can now partake in four new adventures that require steely resolve and courage in the face of the odd, twisted, and downright supernatural. The 'Strange Tales of the West' missions are available now in Red Dead Online for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#RedDeadOnline #Gaming #IGN
title: Red Dead Online - Official 'Strange Tales of the West' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the aespa and naevis Collaboration Announcement Trailer for Street Fighter 6, the latest installment in the legendary fighting game franchise. Players will soon be able to access iconic new outfits inspired by aespa, a popular K-pop artist. Fighters can also have naevis as a real-time commentator to call the most intense of fights. The aespa and naevis Collaboration for Street Fighter 6 is starting on July 4 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#StreetFighter6 #aespa #narvis
title: Street Fighter 6 x aespa and naevis - Official Collaboration Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
This week on Next-Gen Console watch, we take a look at the state of games exclusive to one console, . Between Sony’s expansion into the PC gaming space, and Microsoft putting more and more Xbox Game Studios games topping the charts on competitors’ platforms, it seems like Nintendo is the only console maker keeping its games in one place, and Donkey Kong Bananza is shaping up to be one of the Switch 2’s first killer (gorilla) apps.

This week’s show is Max Scoville, Ryan McCaffrey, Logan Plant, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: Comparing the ACTUAL Exclusives of PS5, Xbox, and Switch 2 - Next Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Check out the first official trailer for The Running Man, from Director Edgar Wright, and based on the novel by Stephen King, this remake of the 1987 classic stars Glen Powell, Daniel Ezra, Katy M. O'Brian, Emilia Jones, Michael Cera, and Colman Domingo.

The Running Man will only be in theatres starting from November 7th 2025.

#IGN #Movies #TheRunningMan #RunningMan
title: The Running Man - Official Trailer (2025) Glen Powell, Michael Cera, Colman Domingo

author: IGN
description:
Captured on PS5 Pro in stunning 4K 60FPS, this scene from Death Stranding 2 starts off as a routine delivery, Sam is tasked with bringing a misanga to the Pizza Chef prepper. But things take a dramatic turn you won’t see coming. No story spoilers, but trust us: this is one moment you’ll be talking about.

#IGN #Gaming #DeathStranding2
title: This Death Stranding 2 Scene Is Absolutely Wild | PS5 Pro 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
On today's Daily Fix: One of the original founding members of xbox, Laura Fryer, says that Xbox Hardware is “Dead” and expressed disappointment with the direction Xbox has taken since she was a part of the company. Xbox recently announced a partnership with ROG for their latest handheld, the ROG XBOX Ally X, which has ROG taking care of the hardware and Xbox the software. To her this is an indication that the company is no longer interested in hardware and is the beginning of an exit for them. She now says that she thinks Xbox Hardware is “dead”. Xbox also announced a partnership with AMD which hints at something hardware related being in the works. Will Xbox’s 25th Year anniversary reveal what's next for XBOX? 

On a more positive note, the actor who voices Edward Kenway in Assassin's Creed Black flag has dropped hints at an Assassins' Creed Black Flag remake being in the works. After the many leaks over the years this is the closest we’ve had to a confirmation. Ubisoft has yet to co
title: 'Xbox Hardware Is Dead,' Says Founding Team Member | IGN Daily The Fix
